Texts.Chs: 我在天人建筑废墟里面找到了一个^orange;神秘的武器核心^reset;。^green;我应该把它交给一个更了解这些古代遗物的人。^reset;
Texts.Eng: I found a ^orange;Mysterious Weapon Core ^reset;in an ancient Centensian ruin. ^green;I should take it to someone who knows more about such ancient relics.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 真是个好发现，上尉！这是一个古老的天人跃迁步枪的核心，但是比一般的跃迁步枪要强大得多。
Texts.Eng: What a find, Captain! This is the core of an ancient Centensian jumprifle, but far more powerful than the common ones.
